article_text:
Kankakee, IL (60901)

Today

Cloudy skies this morning followed by scattered showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon. High near 85F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

article_metadata.author: Dennis Yohnkadyohnka@daily-journal.com815-937-3384

og.title: Can a school save Milford?
